audit_log.comment: The list comprehension correctly filters n >= 0.

audit_log.requirement: Sorts the remaining numbers in ascending order
audit_log.comment: The code uses 'reverse=True', resulting in descending order.

audit_log.requirement: Raises ValueError if input is not a list
audit_log.comment: Missing validation to check if 'numbers' is an instance of list.

audit_log.requirement: Raises ValueError if any element in the list is not an integer
audit_log.comment: Missing validation for element types; code will raise TypeError instead of ValueError for non-comparable types.
